description: An informal bistro where the imaginative cuisine prepared by the owner-chef showcases the best Italian recipes while remaining open to influences from other parts of the world, resulting in strong, unique and captivating flavours. Guests also have the option of smaller dishes to share, but if you really want to get to know the essence of this restaurant, it’s best to go for the guided menu.
